about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:

package:

    version: 2.0.0

    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalpulsar-2.0.0.tar.xz

    number: 0

requirements:

        - cctools 927.0.2 h5ba7a2e_4

        - libiconv 1.15 h0b31af3_1006
        - libllvm9 9.0.1 h7475705_1
        - llvm-tools 9.0.1 h1341992_1
        - llvmdev 9.0.1 h7475705_1
        - make 4.3 h0b31af3_0
        - pcre 8.44 h4a8c4bd_0
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 hdc84dc8_1006
        - swig 4.0.2 h4a8c4bd_0
        - tapi 1000.10.8 ha1b3eb9_4
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    host:
        - astropy 3.2.3 py37h0b31af3_0
        - attrs 19.3.0 py_0
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - certifi 2020.6.20 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - cffi 1.14.0 py37h356ff06_0
        - cryptography 2.9.2 py37he655712_0
        - fftw 3.3.8 nompi_h44ae4c8_1110
        - gsl 2.6 ha2d443c_0
        - hdf5 1.10.6 nompi_h3e39495_100

        - idna 2.9 py_1
        - importlib-metadata 1.6.1 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - importlib_metadata 1.6.1 0
        - lal 7.0.0 fftw_h8450661_100
        - lalpulsar 2.0.0 h897cfd9_0
        - libblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcxx 10.0.0 h1af66ff_2

        - libopenblas 0.3.9 h3d69b6c_0

        - numpy 1.14.6 py37hde6bac1_1201
        - openssl 1.1.1g h0b31af3_0
        - packaging 20.4 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - pluggy 0.13.1 py37hc8dfbb8_2
        - psutil 5.7.0 py37h9bfed18_1
        - py 1.8.2 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - pycparser 2.20 py_0
        - pyopenssl 19.1.0 py_1
        - pyparsing 2.4.7 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - pytest 5.4.3 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - pytest-arraydiff 0.3 py_0
        - pytest-astropy 0.7.0 py_0
        - pytest-astropy-header 0.1.2 py_0
        - pytest-doctestplus 0.7.0 py_1
        - pytest-openfiles 0.5.0 py_0
        - pytest-remotedata 0.3.1 py_0
        - python 3.7.6 h90870a6_5_cpython

        - python-lal 7.0.0 fftw_py37he01a24b_100
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 hcfe32e1_0
        - scipy 1.4.1 py37hce1b9e5_3
        - setuptools 47.3.1 py37hc8dfbb8_0
        - six 1.15.0 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - sortedcontainers 2.2.2 pyh9f0ad1d_0
        - sqlite 3.30.1 h93121df_0

        - xz 5.2.5 h0b31af3_0
        - zipp 3.1.0 py_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    run:
        - astropy
        - gsl >=2.6,<2.7.0a0
        - lal >=7.0.0
        - lal >=7.0.0,<8.0a0
        - lalpulsar 2.0.0 h897cfd9_0
        - numpy >=1.14.6,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python-lal >=7.0.0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
        - six
test:
    commands:
        - pushd test/python; LAL_TEST_PKGDATADIR="${LALPULSAR_DATADIR}" python -m
            pytest -v; popd
    imports:
        - lalpulsar
        - lalpulsar.NstarTools
        - lalpulsar.PulsarParametersWrapper
        - lalpulsar.simulateCW
    requires:
        - pytest >=4.0.0a0
    source_files:
        - test/python
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

        This package contains the python bindings.'
    dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
    doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalpulsar/
    home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
    license: GPL-2.0-or-later
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - skymoo

about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.
